name: Twiggys Adventure
description:
Welcome to Twiggys Adventure! This game is a 2D platformer demo made in Godot engine. Its my opening project to a new series I'm starting: Exploring different games in different game engines!

Consider pledging to my Patreon!

Patreon link: CLICK HERE

Patreons receive:

- monthly newsletters and sneak peeks with screenshots

- free completed projects

- early access to demos

- Rom file for gameboy games (public only gets demo web version)

How to play Twiggys Adventure:

Jump through levels and collect coins. Dash to kill enemies.

Controls:

Left/right arrow keys for moving

Up arrow key/space for jump

Shift is for dashing

Credits:
